channel.title: [VB] irc bot
channel.description: Well i got bored and decided to make a irc bot using winsock it dosent have many features has setup form has !bang command and !say command will be adding more

item.title: [VB] irc bot
item.dc:creator: @nohope nohope
item.description:
@nohope wrote:

[quote=“Cain_”]i got banned for calling IWantDDoS a nigger w0w[/quote]since when is telling the truth bannable

item.title: [VB] irc bot
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“Freddy1990, post:6, topic:227055”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=298373.msg2398262#msg2398262 date=1219274517]
back when i did some vb, everything you write no matter how well you write it, you will look back and think its the shittest code in the world. (or though i used an invisible textbox to store variables when i didn’t know how to declare one.

Was so funny, id have a form with like 50 textboxes on it, set to invisible just so i could use them to store hold values.

[/quote]
Lol, I used invisible textboxes as global variables at the very beginning =P And I had programs with like 15 timers, lol[/quote]

That almost made me cry…

But yes, I admit, it is kind of a crappy language…

Read full topic

Was so funny, id have a form with like 50 textboxes on it, set to invisible just so i could use them to store hold values.[/quote]
